page.title: 16Ashton Gardens
page.content: Ashton Gardens is a fairly big park.When we visited Ashton Gardens we looked at many kinds of trees.The gardener said that in Ashton Gardens there are over 50 kinds of trees.When we had spotted all the trees we could, we went on to look at all the activities.There were two bowling greens,a childrens playground with lots of things to play on.There is also football and putting areas,a duck pond and aviory.We tested the playground after drawing the War Memorial,the Main Entrance and the Citizens Advice Bureau.First we drew the War Memorial.It had the names of local soldiers who died during the Second World War.Then we drew the Main Entrance which was very fancy,it was one of the 5 entrances.It was attached to the Citizens Advice Bureau which we also drew.
